extension.summary: Watch NHK World Japan in Full HD - live stream, on-demand and news programs
extension.description:
Watch NHK World Japan in Full HD
- Live Stream - On demand programs - By program, latest and most watched, categories and playlist. You can also browse and search through all programs. - Live schedule - Top Stories and At a Glance - News programs like NEWSLINE, NEWSLINE IN DEPTH and NEWSROOM TOKYO
Content is retrieved and played directly from the NHK World web site.
Plugin supports fallback to HD if you should encounter buffering issues.
Tested on Kodi 18.6+ Leia and 19 Matrix.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is a fan project and not related in any way to NHK!
extension.news: v1.0.1 - Removed optional setting of View States so that plugin can be submitted to official repo
